query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS anomaly_detections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT,
  timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL,
  value DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
  anomaly_score DECIMAL(10,6) NOT NULL,
  is_anomaly INT DEFAULT 0,
  anomaly_type ENUM('spike', 'drop', 'drift', 'noise', 'pattern', 'unknown'),
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'low',
  confidence DECIMAL(5,4),
  expected_min DECIMAL(15,6),
  expected_max DECIMAL(15,6),
  deviation DECIMAL(10,4),
  acknowledged INT DEFAULT 0,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  acknowledged_at BIGINT,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_anomaly_model (model_id),
  INDEX idx_anomaly_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_anomaly_timestamp (timestamp),
  INDEX idx_anomaly_severity (severity)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS anomaly_detections (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_id INT NOT NULL,
  device_id INT,
  timestamp BIGINT NOT NULL,
  value DECIMAL(15,6) NOT NULL,
  anomaly_score DECIMAL(10,6) NOT NULL,
  is_anomaly INT DEFAULT 0,
  anomaly_type ENUM('spike', 'drop', 'drift', 'noise', 'pattern', 'unknown'),
  severity ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical') DEFAULT 'low',
  confidence DECIMAL(5,4),
  expected_min DECIMAL(15,6),
  expected_max DECIMAL(15,6),
  deviation DECIMAL(10,4),
  acknowledged INT DEFAULT 0,
  acknowledged_by INT,
  acknowledged_at BIGINT,
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_anomaly_model (model_id),
  INDEX idx_anomaly_device (device_id),
  INDEX idx_anomaly_timestamp (timestamp),
  INDEX idx_anomaly_severity (severity)
)
